page.title: 04PRE SCHOOL EDUCATION
page.content: The children start play group at the age of 2\ to 3 years and most of them said they enjoyed it.Play group starts at 9.20 am.They draw pictures and paint them,do glueing,go on walks, listen to stories and they learn to read and write in their work books. They get refreshements such as milk and biscuits.There are 50 children in all,25 each morning.There has to be 1 teacher to each 8 children.They must have 4 teachers for 25 children.Play group began Sept. 1977 in the play leaders house with 8 children,but soon got too big and moved to Hole Farm in Jan. 1979.They finish play group at 11.50 am.They leave at the age of 5 years,each child then going on to primary school.
